questions.question: In the given data which combinaiton of number of pregnancies and outcome(whether a person has heart disease or not) leads to the highest and lowest blood pressure,respectively?

answer.value: 2 pregancies and no heart disease has the highest blood pressure while person with 9 pregnancies and a heart disease has the lowest blood pressure

reasoning.reasoning: After implementing this tool we discover that person with 2 pregancies and no heart disease has the highest blood pressure while person with 9 pregnancies and a heart disease has the lowest blood pressure.
